definition: see 烏壓壓|乌压压[wu1 ya1 ya1]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The park is packed with a dense crowd.
sentences.chinese: 公園裏黑壓壓地擠滿了人。

sentences.english: The whole ridge, up on the east, is black with horsemen.
sentences.chinese: 東邊高處，整個山脊上黑壓壓的全是騎兵。

sentences.english: The square was thronged with a dense crowd.
sentences.chinese: 廣場是黑壓壓的擠滿了人。

sentences.english: Except for a light in one of the top windows, the house was all dark.
sentences.chinese: 除了頂樓一扇窗子透出的光線，整座房子黑壓壓一片。

sentences.english: The roofs about the grim stone building were black with police.
sentences.chinese: 陰森的石頭建築的屋頂是黑壓壓的警察。

sentences.english: The people achieving ultimate success could see silver linings to the darkest clouds.
sentences.chinese: 最終取得成功的人能透過黑壓壓的烏雲看到希望。

definition: lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
